languages.text: "А-альбрис... Ты меня слышишь? АЛЬБРИС!" {n}Вирт цепляется обрубками пальцев за поникшие плечи, но существо остается недвижимо.{/n} "Молю вас, посланни{mf|к|ца} небес, не убивайте! Смилуйтесь! Это же Альбрис, просто Альбрис..."

traits.locale_text: "А-альбрис... Ты меня слышишь? АЛЬБРИС!" {n}Вирт цепляется обрубками пальцев за поникшие плечи, но существо остается недвижимо.{/n} "Молю вас, посланни{mf|к|ца} небес, не убивайте! Смилуйтесь! Это же Альбрис, просто Альбрис..."

languages.text: "A-albris... Can you hear me? ALBRIS!" {n}Vir grabs his sagging shoulders with the stubs of his fingers, but the creature does not move.{/n} "I am begging you, Heavenly Envoy, do not kill him! Have mercy! This is Albris, just Albris..."
languages.original_text: "А-альбрис... Ты меня слышишь? АЛЬБРИС!" {n}Вирт цепляется обрубками пальцев за поникшие плечи, но существо остается недвижимо.{/n} "Молю вас, посланни{mf|к|ца} небес, не убивайте! Смилуйтесь! Это же Альбрис, просто Альбрис..."

traits.locale_text: "A-albris... Can you hear me? ALBRIS!" {n}Vir grabs the yielding shoulders with his finger stubs, but the creature does not move.{/n} "I am begging you, Heavenly Envoy, do not kill him! Have mercy! This is Albris, just Albris..."

"A-albris... Can you hear me? ALBRIS!" {n}Vir grabs his sagging shoulders with the stubs of his fingers, but the creature does not move.{/n} "I am begging you, Heavenly Envoy, do not kill him! Have mercy! This is Albris, just Albris..."

"A-albris... Can you hear me? ALBRIS!" {n}Vir grabs his sagging shoulders with the stubs of his fingers, but the creature does not move.{/n} "I am begging you, Heavenly Envoy, do not kill him! Have mercy! This is Albris, just Albris..."

languages.text: 「ア…アルブリス…聞こえるか？アルブリス！」{n}ヴィルはその垂れた肩を、指の断片でつかむが、その生物は微動だしない。{/n}「お願いします、天の使節よ、彼を殺さないでください！どうかご慈悲を！これはアルブリス、ただのアルブリスなのです…」
languages.original_text: "A-albris... Can you hear me? ALBRIS!" {n}Vir grabs his sagging shoulders with the stubs of his fingers, but the creature does not move.{/n} "I am begging you, Heavenly Envoy, do not kill him! Have mercy! This is Albris, just Albris..."

traits.locale_text: 「ア…アルブリス…聞こえるか？アルブリス！」{n}ヴィルはその垂れた肩を、指の断片でつかむが、その生物は微動だしない。{/n}「お願いします、天の使節よ、彼を殺さないでください！どうかご慈悲を！これはアルブリス、ただのアルブリスなのです…」

languages.text: « A-Albris... Tu m'entends ? ALBRIS ! » {n}Du bout de ses moignons, Vir secoue l'épaule de son compagnon amorphe, mais la créature ne réagit pas.{/n} « Je vous en supplie, émissaire céleste, ne le tuez pas ! Pitié ! C'est Albris, c'est juste Albris... »
languages.original_text: "A-albris... Can you hear me? ALBRIS!" {n}Vir grabs his sagging shoulders with the stubs of his fingers, but the creature does not move.{/n} "I am begging you, Heavenly Envoy, do not kill him! Have mercy! This is Albris, just Albris..."

traits.locale_text: « A-Albris... Tu m'entends ? ALBRIS ! » {n}Du bout de ses moignons, Vir secoue l'épaule de son compagnon amorphe, mais la créature ne réagit pas.{/n} « Je vous en supplie, émissaire céleste, ne le tuez pas ! Pitié ! C'est Albris, c'est juste Albris... »

languages.text: “阿……阿布里斯……你能听到我说话吗？”{n}维尔紧紧地抓着那个人下垂的肩膀，但他纹丝不动。{/n}“我求求你了，天国的使者！别杀他！发发慈悲吧！他是阿布里斯，不是别人……”
languages.original_text: "A-albris... Can you hear me? ALBRIS!" {n}Vir grabs his sagging shoulders with the stubs of his fingers, but the creature does not move.{/n} "I am begging you, Heavenly Envoy, do not kill him! Have mercy! This is Albris, just Albris..."

traits.locale_text: “阿……阿布里斯……你能听到我说话吗？”{n}维尔紧紧地抓着那个人下垂的肩膀，但他纹丝不动。{/n}“我求求你了，天国的使者！别杀他！发发慈悲吧！他是阿布里斯，不是别人……”

languages.text: «A-Albris... ¿me oyes? ¡ALBRIS!». {n}Vir le agarra los hombros caídos con los muñones de los dedos, pero la criatura no se mueve.{/n} «Se lo ruego, {mf|Enviado Divino|Enviada Divina}: ¡no lo mate! ¡Tenga piedad! Es Albris, nadie más...».
languages.original_text: "A-albris... Can you hear me? ALBRIS!" {n}Vir grabs his sagging shoulders with the stubs of his fingers, but the creature does not move.{/n} "I am begging you, Heavenly Envoy, do not kill him! Have mercy! This is Albris, just Albris..."

traits.locale_text: «A-Albris... ¿me oyes? ¡ALBRIS!». {n}Vir le agarra los hombros caídos con los muñones de los dedos, pero la criatura no se mueve.{/n} «Se lo ruego, {mf|Enviado Divino|Enviada Divina}: ¡no lo mate! ¡Tenga piedad! Es Albris, nadie más...».

languages.text: "A-Albris ... Hört Ihr mich? ALBRIS!" {n}Vir packt mit den Stummeln seiner Finger die herabgesackten Schultern, doch die Kreatur rührt sich nicht.{/n} "Ich flehe Euch an, {mf|himmlischer Gesandter|himmlische Gesandte}, tötet Ihn nicht! Habt Gnade! Das ist Albris, es ist doch nur Albris ..."
languages.original_text: "A-albris... Can you hear me? ALBRIS!" {n}Vir grabs his sagging shoulders with the stubs of his fingers, but the creature does not move.{/n} "I am begging you, Heavenly Envoy, do not kill him! Have mercy! This is Albris, just Albris..."

traits.locale_text: "A-Albrist ... Hört Ihr mich? ALBRIS!" {n}Vir packt mit den Stummeln seiner Finger die herabgesackten Schultern, doch die Kreatur rührt sich nicht.{/n} "Ich flehe Euch an, {mf|himmlischer Gesandter|himmlische Gesandte}, tötet Ihn nicht! Habt Gnade! Das ist Albris, es ist doch nur Albris ..."

languages.text: "A... Albris, beni duyuyor musun? ALBRİS!" {n}Vir, kesik parmaklarıyla sarkan omuzlarını tutuyor ama yaratık kıpırdamıyor.{/n} "Yalvarırım Kutsal Elçi, onu öldürme! Acı bize! Sadece Albris bu..."
